mapper.insert: insert into member (email, pw, name) values(#{email},#{pw},#{name})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where email=#{email}
select count(*) from member where email=#{email} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw} where email=#{email}
update member set name=#{name} where email=#{email}
update member set phone=#{phone} where email=#{email}
mapper.select: > select * from member order by grade
select * from (select row_number() over(order by grade) line, member.* from member) where line between #{start} and #{end}
select name from member where email=#{value}
mapper.update: update member set point = (point + #{et_point}) -#{et_usedpoint} where email = #{et_email}
